metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2712 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse GlassFish versions 5.1.0 to 6.2.5, there is a vulnerability in relative path traversal because it does not filter request path starting with './'. Successful exploitation could allow an remote unauthenticated attacker to access critical data, such as configuration files and deployed application source code.

criterions.comment: glassfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
